title: Archives of Razi Institute
additional-note: This is an Iranian publication. As of early December 2020, the United States has no copyright relations with Iran, so Iran-originating publications do not have copyright protection in the US. The US copyright status of this journal may change if Iran establishes copyright relations with the US, either directly or via treaties like the Berne Convention.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Ed Deegan for copyright research on this title.
